entries.question: what is benwa offline?
entries.answer:
a truly humbling experience
a bountiful harvest
imagery divorced of its original form

entries.question: are these pictures of benwa?
entries.answer:
some are
others are meditations on what being benwa entails
or feeble attempts to convey a spiritual message

entries.question: why are you doing this?
entries.answer: to honor the memory of my brother (rip trevor)

entries.question: how can i support benwa online?
entries.answer:
create your own benwa-based content
optionally add it to benwa online
